nari_osman:
No safety or comfort riding with bolt. You charge a penalty to riders if they cancel the ride when the driver is messing around, but do not penalise the drivers when they cancel last minute, while they are literally 2 minutes away from you and you have waited 15 minutes for them to arrive.

Get your drivers to be decent people! This happens to so many people everyday in Barcelona, terrible! I have been a bolt customer for 7 years, but with my experiences lately, I am moving over to uber!! Drivers should have consequences!!
